name: element citybuild
description:
This game is not balanced! How to play:

You get 10  each turn.

  • buy buildings from the shop for 3 . 
  • reroll for 1 .
  • place element for 2 . (click and drag from icon)
Building description:
  • type (show where the element should be):

 next to: the four places straight

 diagonal: the four places diagonal

 near: all surrounding places

 far: all not surrounding places

  • each / min:

each: gets points each time the count is hit

min: gets the points when the count is hit

  • count:

shows the number of elements that must be placed on the correct places (type)

  • element: ///

shows what element is needed

  • points:

shows how many money () you get

Payments:
  • you have to pay after 3 days to continue
  • you get 2 element points after paying
  • after 30 days you win
Sell (Right click):
  • buildings: you get 2 
  • elements: you get the element point back

Credits: made everything by myself
